page.title: 18SANDWICK - MAIL ORDER (2)
page.content: On the 7th of November 1985 I interviewed{Miss S. Macleod. I asked her how long she has been involved with{mail order shopping.}She said for nearly three years and said that she uses{John Noble and Freemans. She has ten customers and sends the money away every month. Then I went on to ask her whether she prefered personal shopping or mail order. She answered immediately, "The catalogues because you don't have to go out of the house". Near the end of the interview I asked her, "How long do the items take to arrive?" and she said that the larger items take longer. Finally I asked her if she was pleased with the variety avalible. She said it was like a new world all together and she also said{that the prices are {tremendous.
